title: Black Cover
description: Black Clover follows Asta, a boy born without magic in a world where magic is everything.

title: Naruto
description: Naruto Uzumaki dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and Hokage of his village.

title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
file: watch.html?anime=That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
description: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime follows Satoru Mikami, an ordinary man who is killed and reborn in a fantasy world as a slime. With unique abilities and a calm mind, he begins building a powerful nation where monsters and humans can live together.

title: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World
